title: Talk Python to Me: #529: Computer Science from Scratch
description: A lot of people building software today never took the traditional CS path. They arrived through curiosity, a job that needed automating, or a late-night itch to make something work. This week, David Kopec joins me to talk about rebuilding computer science fo…
